analyzed: mig sman mdog can zhal gcig phyag gnyis ba

original: zur phud lnga pa rdo rje'i skyil krung can //

original: dar dang rin chen rgyan gyis mdzes pa'i sku'i //

analyzed: gnas gsum bru gsum gnas las d zer phro
